name: GPT-4o Search Preview (Mar 2025)
description: GPT-4o Search Preview March 2025 release optimized for web search queries, with direct access to live web data and trained to understand and execute search operations.
notes: March 11, 2025 release. Dual pricing structure: $25 per 1K searches plus $30 per 1M tokens for both input and output. Supports geolocation-based search customization via 'user_location' parameter. Generates responses in JSON format for API integration. Designed for Chat Completions API with web_search_options parameter.
